text: Va onhoe, ki imon ovardaand, (ja'ne, mū'minon dar holi munofiqon dar ta'aççuʙ monda ʙa jakdigar) megūjand: «Ojo inho hamon kasoneand, ki ʙa Alloh savgandhoi saxt mexūrdand, ki ʙo şumo xohand ʙud?», amalhojaşon, ki dar dunjo ʙa ço ovardand ʙa saʙaʙi gumoni ʙadaşon ʙar islomu musalmonon ʙotil gardid, pas xud dar zumrai zijonkoron daromadand
